title: Cannot enter full screen
content: hi. I'm having trouble making firefox full-screen. Whenever i try to make firefox full screen, firefox gets stuck and cannot continue working. i must force-quit whenever i tried to enter full screen
creator: kunyang.du

title: Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.2
content:
the web based software requires: "Firefox users must install the Microsoft .NET Framework Assistant add-on."

downloading / install: https://www.microsoft.com/en-US/download/details.aspx?id=42642

results in: .NET Framework 4.5.2 or a later update is already installed on this computer.

searching Firefox Browser ADD-ONS yields: 0 results found for "Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.2"


...(help) with appreciation in advance, m
creator: MKub3905

title: firefox
content: Ola. Detesto usar outros navegadores, mas nao encontro mais como diminuir o tamanho das abas e como selecionar as paginas só movendo o cursor do mouse até a a aba... Será que vou ter que usar obrigatoriamente outro navegador?... Por favor, alguém poderia me ensinar como faço?
creator: JackLu

title: latest version of firefox not compatible with my OS X El Capitan 10.11.6
content: I naively downloaded the latest update which doesn't work with my older OS--now I can't access any of my accounts or bookmarks etc--I want my older version of Firefox Back. Can I reinstall a version of Firefox that will work with my OS? Help!!! And, thank you in advance.
creator: sabina5

title: The screen moves when I type.
content: When I go to type something into a box in Facebook (I think it's only Facebook, it's not happening here) the screen keeps jumping so the text box moves to the very bottom of the screen. If my mouse is over anything with alt text, then I can't see what I'm typing because the status bar appears at the bottom of the screen.
creator: ajuk.uk
